<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Columna izquierda: título arriba, imagen debajo --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="start|top">
<TextView android:id="@+id/title_text_land" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="15dp" android:text="@string/title_mock" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/detail_image_land" android:layout_width="200dp" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:src="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:background="@drawable/circle_border" android:contentDescription="@string/detail_image_desc" android:clipToOutline="true" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Columna derecha: descripción --> <TextView android:id="@+id/description_text_land" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:gravity="center" android:text="@string/description_mock" android:textAlignment="center" android:paddingStart="10dp" android:paddingEnd="10dp" android:textSize="16sp" />
</LinearLayout>
